what: Interactive Transect Clipping with lidR — clip_transect_interactive
title: Interactive Transect Clipping with lidR — clip_transect_interactive
text: function interactively clips transect LAS dataset. first generates surface height model displays . user prompted click two points (start end transect) plot. transect polygon constructed points used clip LAS dataset.

title: Interactive Transect Clipping with lidR — clip_transect_interactive
Interactive Transect Clipping with lidR — clip_transect_interactive
text: las character string specifying path LAS/LAZ file LAS object. width Numeric. width transect. Default 1. res Numeric. resolution rasterizing canopy height model. Default 0.5. subcircle Numeric. Parameter p2r function used canopy rasterization. Default 0.

title: Interactive Transect Clipping with lidR — clip_transect_interactive
Interactive Transect Clipping with lidR — clip_transect_interactive
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{   # use the Megaplot example dataset from lidR:   lasFile <- system.file("extdata", "Megaplot.laz", package = "lidR")    las_clipped <- clip_transect_interactive(       las       = lasFile,       width     = 5,       res       = 1,       subcircle = 0.25     )     } # }
